data.eml:eml: A review of the Pseudobarbusafer (Peters, 1864) species complex (Teleostei, Cyprinidae) in the eastern Cape Fold Ecoregion of South Africa

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Chakona, Albert, Skelton, Paul H. (2017): A review of the Pseudobarbusafer (Peters, 1864) species complex (Teleostei, Cyprinidae) in the eastern Cape Fold Ecoregion of South Africa. ZooKeys 657: 109-140, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.657.11076, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.657.11076
